title: 95/234/EC: Commission Decision of 22 June 1995 concerning the approval of 31 proposed measures which qualify for Community financing pursuant to Council Decision 94/445/EC on inter-administration telematic networks for statistics relating to the trading of goods between Member States (Edicom)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 June 1995 concerning the approval of 31 proposed measures which qualify for Community financing pursuant to Council Decision 94/445/EC on inter-administration telematic networks for statistics relating to the trading of goods between Member States (Edicom) (95/234/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The 31 proposals listed in Annex may receive Community financing up to the amounts stated in that Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 June 1995.
For the Commission
Yves-Thibault DE SILGUY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 183, 19. 7. 1994, p. 42.
(2) OJ No L 181, 28. 6. 1989, p. 47.
(3) OJ No L 316, 16. 11. 1991, p. 1.
ANNEX
>TABLE>
